Lines.string: Gui.SS_Form1.txtLot.tooltip("Type the lot and press Enter or Scan the lot")
'if called from issue material non-commited screen
'if called from issue material non-commited screen
'Remove _ if it is not within your DSNs.
'if called from issue non-committed material screen script 1 hook

V.Local.sSql.Set("SELECT LOT, PART, LOCATION, JOB, SUFFIX, HEAT, SERIAL_NUMBER, PURCHASE_ORDER, PO_LINE, CODE_TRANSACTION FROM V_ITEM_HISTORY WHERE DATE_HISTORY>'2015-12-01' GROUP BY LOT, PART, LOCATION, JOB, SUFFIX, HEAT, SERIAL_NUMBER, PURCHASE_ORDER, PO_LINE, CODE_TRANSACTION HAVING CODE_TRANSACTION IN ('J52','R11','P11')")

F.Intrinsic.String.Concat("Select DESCRIPTION, UM_INVENTORY from V_INVENTORY_MSTR where PART = '",V.uGlobal.uLabel(V.Local.i)!Part,"' and LOCATION = '",V.uGlobal.uLabel(V.Local.i)!Loc,"'",V.Local.sSql)
V.Local.sSql.Set("SELECT JOB, SUFFIX, PART, LOCATION, PRODUCT_LINE, CUSTOMER FROM V_JOB_HEADER UNION SELECT JOB, SUFFIX, PART, LOCATION, PRODUCT_LINE, CUSTOMER FROM V_JOB_HIST_MAST")
F.Intrinsic.UI.Msgbox("Quantity on labels greater than part quantity.","")
F.Intrinsic.UI.Msgbox("Quantity on labels less than part quantity.","")
F.Intrinsic.UI.Msgbox("Quantity on labels greater than part quantity.","")
'select the last ID from the standard table based on ID and sequence
f.Intrinsic.String.Build("Select TOP 1 F_LONG, ID, DATE_LAST_CHG, TIME_LAST_CHG, SEQUENCE from OP_HEADER where ID = '{0}' AND SEQUENCE = '{1}'","401895","0002",v.Local.slastlotsql)
'if one is found add to it using the F_LONG
'set teh field as 0's and text field
''update the custom table, may no longer need since OP_HEADER is being updated directly
'no longer need to call this subroutine

F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT JOB, SUFFIX, PART, LOCATION, CUSTOMER, PRODUCT_LINE FROM V_JOB_HEADER WHERE JOB='{0}' AND SUFFIX='{1}'",V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtJS.Text,V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtSuffix.Text,V.Local.sSql)

F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT JOB, SUFFIX, PART, LOCATION, CUSTOMER, PRODUCT_LINE FROM V_JOB_HIST_MAST WHERE JOB='{0}' AND SUFFIX='{1}'",V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtJS.Text,V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtSuffix.Text,V.Local.sSql)
F.Intrinsic.String.Concat("Select DESCRIPTION, UM_INVENTORY from V_INVENTORY_MSTR where PART = '",V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtPart.Text,"' and LOCATION = '",V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtLoc.Text,"'",V.Local.sSql)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT TOP 1 PART, LOT FROM V_ITEM_HISTORY WHERE LOT='{0}'",V.Screen.SS_Form1!txtLot.Text,V.Local.sSql)
F.Intrinsic.UI.Msgbox("This lot is already in use, please try again","Warning")
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT TOP 1 PART, LOT FROM V_ITEM_HISTORY WHERE LOT='{0}'",V.Local.sLot.Trim,V.Local.sSql)

F.Intrinsic.String.Build("This lot corresponds to the part number: {0} Please check the entered lot, because this lot can not be used for this work order {1}{2} If the problem persists please call your supervisor",V.ODBC.con!rstLot.FieldValTrim!PART,V.Ambient.NewLine,V.Ambient.NewLine,V.Local.sMsg)
